title: Leblanc Needs (Good) A Skin
body:
Well, I started playing {{champion:7}} a few weeks ago, and I was like this champ's pretty cool, so I decided to buy a skin for her. 

But then I realized all her skins suck. The two skins that are "available" are Prestigous and Wicked Leblanc. Basically in one she has a different outfit, and the other she put on more clothes. I saw the Ravenborn Leblanc skin and I was like, WOAH THIS LOOKS BOSS. But it wasn't available. 

What I'm tryna say is Leblanc is a cool champion and a skin that changed her ability fx would be great. I really don't understand why Ravenborn Leblanc is legacy, it's the best one!    

-waits for Halloween-

replies.body: I dont think leblanc is gonna get a new skin anytime soon ( ravenborn op ), but dont worry, ravenborn leblanc will be available during the harrowing coming soon :D

She has 2 awesome skins but they are limited, as you said. 

And her ravenclaw skin has a very ugly E animation, imho.

> [{quoted}](name=computo2000,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=W3txfp8f,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-27T17:04:24.045+0000)
>
> She has 2 awesome skins but they are limited, as you said. 
> 
> And her ravenclaw skin has a very ugly E animation, imho.

and sounds

As someone who owns Ravenborn LeBlanc... it is indeed very boss! :3

I wish bossness upon you as well! :D
I agree. She has terrible skins that are available for purchase. I was lucky enough to get a Ravenborn skin and I think it's her best skin.
She needs a vu b4 a new skin

> [{quoted}](name=LilQuacker,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=W3txfp8f,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-09-27T19:51:37.271+0000)
>
> She needs a vu b4 a new skin

I feel like shes in a fairly good spot. The texture rebalances helped her not fall behind. Maybe a little update on her effects would be nice.
I said the same thing. Then I got Ravenborn LeBlanc from the Mystery skins. :3
you can unlock raven with mystery skins
Mistletoe Le Blanc is nice too. I have to admit though, I rather like Wicked Le Blanc.
Mistletoe Leblanc is a nice one too
Wukong and Maokai are on the same boat
